pr_title: CB-8547: Use FreeIPA healthcheck for cluster proxy

timeline.bodyText: could you drop static and convert this class to @Component and use inject in ClusterProxyService so we can mock this class easily if we add unit tests for it?
timeline.author: lacikaaa

replies.bodyText: Sure. I also updated the other availability checkers to be components.
replies.author: jamisonbennett

timeline.message:
CB-8547: Use FreeIPA healthcheck for cluster proxy

Register the FreeIPA healthcheck with cluster proxy for new clusters.
Continue using the old login page as the status check for clusters
that were provisioned prior to the healthcheck's existence.

This was tested with a local deployment of cloudbreak.
